summary: You're on the Bridge, the nerve center of this derelict space vessel, surrounded by decades-old blinking machinery.
detail: The Bridge of this old spacecraft has clearly seen better days, with half the screens flickering their sad, outdated data. The aroma of burnt circuitry permeates the air, hinting at an amusingly catastrophic failure. A control panel covered in dust promises interaction and, dare we say, adventure.

expression.content: Peering at the control panel, you squint to decipher the contours of what seems to be a button labelled 'DO NOT PRESS'. Some unintelligible symbols adorn the rest of the panel as a constant reminder of the vessel's otherworldly origins.

expressions.content: Ignoring convention and reason, you enthusiastically press the 'DO NOT PRESS' button. The room falls into darkness, followed by a cacophony of mechanical groans as the ship's engines reboot. Old screens dance with new life as the ship dutifully follows some long-forgotten course. The consequences, of course, remain to be seen.

expression.content: You press the button again, and much to your disappointment, nothing happens. It seems that you've already committed the vessel to its destination. Perhaps seeking out other areas of potential debacle might not be such a terrible idea.

expressions.content: As you step foot onto the Bridge, an automated voice cheerily intones, 'Welcome to the Bridge! May your stay be enjoyable and may your adventures be adequately thrilling.' Its fading voice prompts the slightest shiver down your spine.
